column5: After several years of renos on my house I can finally retire the 12 ft tin boat i have had since i was seven years old. Decided on a Buying a used Ranger bass boat turns out the seller was a near by cottage neigbour and a avid fisherman, why was he selling the boat, something to do with a house lol. took this thing out sunday on lake o in some 4 fter's I got to tell everyone that 50 mph and 4 fter's is kind of scary but i stayed  dry Can't wait to try it out this weekend
Real nice rig you bought ecmilley    Congratulation
Very very nice! Good on ya Ernie.....you should have a great time with it, great boat. Congrats!
That looks pretty good to me!!!! enjoy.
Boyz & their toyz, ya gotta love it.   WTG Ernie and congrats on the purchase, that's a sweet looking boat, but after reading your signature I'm surprised to see that Evinrude hanging off the stern
thanks Lew , as much as I love my yammy products this was a great deal and that evinrude is a nice strong runner (not that a 200 hdpi yammy isn't in the future  )

Nice set-up,you will like that rude.60* head v-6 was the best engine OMC ever made,they are bullet proof and torquey as ****.I ran one a used one for 5yrs and besides a starter in it's 15th yr had zero problems and great compression.What model is that 373?
All you need now is a new gas credit card with no limit!
nice going on the new ride..sounds like a long time coming for that one....hope you get many years of fun out of her
SWEET RIDE !!!  Probably goes just slightly faster than the 12 footer.

Boy yer going to love that boat. Enjoy and have some great safe fun on it.  I had the baby size down from that one.    PS. I have been looking at a Cobra. Just waiting to hear back on a counter offer.LOL
ITS about time bud !!!! i know we will catch lots of fish in it too,we will have to do our maiden voyage in it this weekend dropshotting for smallies !!!!
love it great package I am looking for a Ranger myself ,congrats again sehs a beaut
